meanings.definition: Zamias: a type of cycad plant
meanings.sent1: The zamias in the garden are green and leafy.
meanings.sent2: I saw some beautiful zamias at the botanical garden.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorns among the zamias.
meanings.sent4: The zamias stood tall like ancient guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The zamias swayed gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the ground.

meanings.definition: Zamias: plural form of zamia, a type of cycad plant
meanings.sent1: Many zamias were planted along the path, creating a lush green border.
meanings.sent2: The zamias in the park added a tropical touch to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The picnic under the zamias turned into a delightful botanical adventure.
meanings.sent4: The zamias whispered secrets of the ancient world to those who listened.
meanings.sent5: The zamias seemed to dance in the sunlight, their fronds swaying gracefully.
